item.title: Loose grating on Ironbridge end of bridge, 15th October
item.description:
The grating on footbridge recently been replaced, end panel becoming loose and lifts when walk on it, at the Twigworth Green estate end of bridge, bridge across the road from end of bridleway which comes off end of Brook Lane. Been gradually getting worse last 2 weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ironbridge Road, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains completely blocked., 15th October
item.description:
There are three drains on Gravel Walk. One near the property “Byways” and two at the bottom on Gravel Walk close to Southam Lane next to properties “Wheelgates” and “ Dalboyne”. All are completely blocked with debris and need clearing before the wet weather starts. These have been reported before, but closed without any resolution. Please contact the parish councillor reporting these defects to discuss before closing,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Walk, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
